thread.title: Piers Morgan walks off GMB set during Brexit debate
thread.title_full: Piers Morgan walks off GMB set during Brexit debate

title: Piers Morgan walks off GMB set during Brexit debate
text: Share this article Share GMB hosts Piers and Susanna Reid began by asking questions to the rival politicians, who then turned on each other, shouting about trading rules and the common market. Piers tapped Susanna on the shoulder and said; 'You know what, we're just going to...'. The pair then stood up and walked off from behind their desk. After joking with production crew, Piers then returned to his seat. The two politicians came in to talk about the Bill to invoke Article 50 currently in Parliament They shouted each other down as they discussed whether the Bill should be voted through The Government was forced to seek Parliament's approval for its Brexit plans by a Supreme Court ruling last week. The legislation giving the Prime Minister permission to trigger Article 50 is expected to pass its first test today, with Labour leader Jeremy Corbyn ordering his MPs to back the Government's Bill. But a revolt from pro-Remain MPs on the Labour benches could give him a headache and he may be forced to sack frontbenchers who fail to follow his orders. Mr Corbyn has been struggling to contain a revolt against his decision to impose a three-line whip ordering Labour MPs to vote for the Bill, with shadow ministers Jo Stevens and Tulip Siddiq quitting in protest and other frontbenchers threatening to oppose it even if it costs them their jobs. The real parliamentary battle is expected to take place next week, when opposition parties attempt to push through a series of amendments as the Bill undergoes detailed scrutiny in its committee stage. Piers has not been afraid to court controversy since he joined Susanna on the sofa Share or comment on this article Most watched News videos
